page.title: 04POST & TELEPHONE BOWERCHALK
page.content: POSTAL SERVICES There is a twice daily collection of letters from 3 Boxes and the Post Office 5 days of the week and once on Saturdays. Theone postal delivery by van is at 10-11am 6 days of the weekly. The Post Office (and village store) is centrally placed and under- takes all main services. TELEPHONES Privately held - Practically every household is connected; some lines are shared. The Exchange is in Salisbury since this year. Ugly overhead lines cross gardens; posts are randomly placed; sound reception is sometimes deplorablke; in places lines are draped over fences. Public call boxes are 2 locations,in the north of the village (often used by lorry drivers) and in the centre near a block of 4 Council Houses.
